org.trafodion.rest

类 RESTServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trafodion.rest.RESTServlet
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    RestConstants

    public class RESTServlet
extends Object
implements RestConstants
    Singleton class encapsulating global REST servlet state and functions.

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.trafodion.rest.RestConstants
